Generate Reports

Choose a report to generate:

Report will generate as an Excel file and download to your computer.

Critical third parties

List of third parties marked as critical

Fields: Vendor Name, Relationship Manager, Inherent Risk, Residual Risk, Category, Business Process

Third party directory

List of all third parties with status and contact information

Fields: Name, Status, Offshore Indicator, Critical Indicator, Category, Relationship Owner, Contact Info

Tasks by owner

List of all tasks grouped by relationship owner and third party

Fields: Owner, Third Party, Task Name, Created Date, Closed Date, Priority, Status, Resources

Incidents by owner

List of all incidents grouped by relationship owner and third party

Fields: Name, Resources, Severity, Start Date, End Date, Status

Expiring Contracts

List of active contracts expiring in next 180 days

Fields: Third Party, Contract Title, Effective Date, Next Expiration Date, Auto-Renewals, Parent Contract, Relationship Owner

Risk Register

List of all risks

Fields: All fields are included. Notes shows the first 512 Characters.

Minimums and Auto-renewals

Third parties and contracts that have auto-renewals or monthly minimums

Fields: Third Party, Contract Title, Status, Contract Expiration Date, Renewal Period, Relationship Owner, Has Minimum, Auto-Renewals.
